bioAsHtml: Senior Java Enterprise Software Architect and passionate about Open Source. Background in banking, insurance, telecommunications, and public domain. He’s an active contributor to Apache TomEE, OpenEJB, OpenWebBeans, Sirona and many others. Involved in the Java Community Process (JCP) and active member of the EJB 3.2 expert group and the new Java Security API. Sharing knowledge by speaking at Java User Groups (JUG) and conferences. Past experiences and present specialties include Spring, Hibernate, JPA, CDI, JSP, SOAP, RESTful services, WS-Security, Tomcat, TomEE, IBM WebSphere, Java EE, SOA architecture and much more. And beyond "normal" workday I also teach Web Services, Java EE, and more at the local university in France.
